section.title: Device List
section.para: A Device List is the object you use in your Control Point application to detect available remote devices for later use. The Device List is represented in code by the protocol-independent base class called CpDeviceList.

Each protocol uses a different mechanism to locate remote devices. However, the mechanism to add and remove remote devices to the Device List is protocol-independent. They all use two callbacks, called added and removed, which are used to manage the list of available devices.
